about_the_game:
Face the battles ahead with confidence, knowing you're equipped for victory in both fashion and firepower.
The Limited Edition Enigmia Pack includes:

- Enigmia REYAB Character Skin
- Enigmia STF12 Weapon Skin
- Enigmia DEagle Weapon Skin

"Unknown mercenaries are frequently hired as contractors for their exceptional skills in combat. To avoid friendly fire and security issues, REYAB Corporation distributes an altered version of its uniform and refers to its hired hands as Enigmia, who fight on behalf of the conglomerate with ambiguous intentions. Some Enigmia eventually join REYAB as fully-fledged members loyal to the organization and its vision for humanity, shedding their purple mantles and having their Unknown markings removed. Others allow their contracts to elapse, seeking to make their way through the world as soldiers of fortune for the highest bidder."

—transmission from an Unknown vendor

name: VAIL VR Enigmia Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Core i7-6700k / Ryzen 7 3700x
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • Additional Notes: Recommend SSD or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Core-i7-12700k / Ryzen 9 3900x+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2080S
  • Additional Notes: Recommend SSD or better

short_description: Join the Reyab Corporation as a mercenary and stand out with the Enigmia Skin pack. Suit up in a sleek new character outfit and build out your arsenal with exclusive weapon skins.
